title: Razer Edge Recovery Drive FULL OFFICIAL
description:
Using the Recovery Key in the USB3 port (The one on top of the tablet, it's green) and the HDMI dock for a usb keyboard, follow these directions:
1) Go into 'Advanced Startup' (Goto POWER and HOLDING SHIFT click on RESTART)
b) OR Win8.0, swipe in CHARM BAR, click on PC Settings, 'General', 'Advanced Restart'
c) OR in Win8.1, swipe in CHARM BAR, click on PC Settings, 'Update and Recovery', 'Recovery', Advanced Startup/'Restart Now'
2) Once there, you'll click on 'USE A DEVICE'.
3) Next, 'INTERNAL SHELL'
3) Once you are there, type 'FS1:' [ENTER]
4) then type 'EFIBOOTBOOTX64.EFI' [ENTER]

The device will then reboot into Razer's recovery media. From there you can reformat the device. (For the techie's, it's a custom WIM installer)
